title: Ideology and Political Education Design for Information Security Majors

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic information security concepts and general awareness of social structures
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based mobile learning environment emphasizing social responsibility and ethical judgment competencies

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain three or more ethical dilemma situations that may arise when applying information security technologies.
When establishing digital security policies, learners can propose practical measures balancing national security and civil rights protection.
In social participation projects using information technology, learners can establish and implement strategies for personal data protection and public interest assurance.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
